name: eMusic Download File
summary: Learn about .EMX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Some versions of eMusic Download Manager use .EMP files and are not compatible with EMX files. eMusic/J is compatible with both EMP and EMX files.
Downloaded eMusic MP3 files may be played in common music players such as Windows Media Player and Apple iTunes.

description: Music file used by eMusic Download Manager, a program that allows users to download .MP3 files; contains information for a music artist, album, and album art; used by Download Manager to download a specified set of MP3 files.
